title: A League of Legends MMORPG
body:
Why Isn't this a thing yet... Like Rito 'Games' (excluding the board game you guys made).

It would be super fun i reckon. Like WOW but League based, There is a Reddit post about it written 3 years ago with heaps of support.
whataya think?

replies.body:
Riot "Game**s**" has technically been a thing since 2010 when they released their [tower defense game](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rqQrVJ_j770). They've also owned [Stonehearth](http://www.stonehearth.net/) since they acquired Radiant Entertainment a few years back.

As for the MMO... Back in 2015 [**Riot Morello** said](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ac8IwuH1-between-two-turrets-chat-with-morello-complete?comment=001c0000) they were interested in developing two types of games:

+ Games to _"bolster League's IP"_. (What probably became Mechs vs. Minions)

+ And _"Genres we like to call 'gamer's games' overall - stuff you can really sink your teeth into."_

I don't know about you, but a MMO of some kind would definitely fit that bottom category :D
